price: „Припремите за њега ломачу“, повикаше, „па га баците у ватру!“
arabic: قَالُواْ ٱبۡنُواْ لَهُۥ بُنۡيَٰنٗا فَأَلۡقُوهُ فِي ٱلۡجَحِيمِ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qālū ib'nū lahu bun'yānan fa-alqūhu fī al-jaḥīmi
